TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CLAuthorizationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify the current status of authorization to use location services.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Authorized = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Authorized = unsigned int32(3)

Docs.summary: The app is allowed to use location services.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Denied = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Denied = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: The app is not allowed to use location services.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus NotDetermined = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus NotDetermined = unsigned int32(0)

Docs.summary: The user has not yet chosen whether to allow location services.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Restricted = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreLocation.CLAuthorizationStatus Restricted = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: Location services are not available and the user cannot change the authorization (e.g., constrained by parental controls).
